name: 語言與認知
description: Survey of issues in the relationship between language and human cognition through studying classical writings and current researches.  Topics include human conceptualization and categorization, cognitive semantics, the cognitive approach to grammar, and the relationship between cognitive linguistics, discourse, and the construal of meaning.
goals: Survey of issues in the relationship between language and human cognition through studying classical writings and current researches.
syllabus:
Discourse and Cognition _(Spring 2020)_
=======================================

**Instructor**: Miao-Hsia Chang  **E-mail**: [mhchang@ntnu.edu.tw](mailto:mhchang@ntnu.edu.tw) 

**Office: Cheng Building 821**

**Office hours:** Wed 13:10-15:10; Thur**:** 12:10-14:10

Survey of issues in the relationship between language and human cognition, especiallythose concerning meaning and grammar. Topics include human conceptualization and categorization, cognitivesemantics, cognitive approaches to grammar, and the relationship between cognitivelinguistics, discourse, and the construal of meaning.
